mapper.select:
SELECT o.order_id, o.product_id, p.thumbnail, p.brief_name AS product_brief_name, p.product_name, IF ( o.state = 4, o.paid_amount, o.order_amount ) as invest_amount, o.pay_time as sub_time, i.name as investor_name, IF ( o.state != 5|| o.state != 2 || o.state != 4, IF(p.setup_time,DATE_ADD(p.setup_time,INTERVAL + p.duration MONTH),null), NULL ) AS expiring_date, o.state as order_state FROM product p, customer c, investor i, orders o WHERE c.id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.mobile = i.mobile AND i.id = o.investor_id AND o.product_id = p.id AND o.org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND o.state <> 2 AND o.state <> 5 order by o.pay_time desc
limit ${page}, ${pageSize}

SELECT o.order_id, o.product_id, e.employee_id, e. NAME AS employee_name, e.mobile AS employee_phone, e.avatar AS employee_avatar, _org.brief_name AS org_brief_name, IF ( o.state = 4, o.paid_amount, o.order_amount ) as invest_amount, o.pay_time AS sub_time, o.pay_sign_user AS contact_file, o.state AS order_state FROM orders o, employee e, org _org where o.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.employee_id = e.employee_id and e.org_id = _org.id and _org.id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
